summary: ACCELERATING ON HIGHWAY, DSC AND EML WARNING LIGHTS CAME ON, VEHICLE WOULD NOT RESPOND TO THROTTLE INPUT AND STARTED DECELERATING SLOWLY IN HEAVY TRAFFIC.  I MADE A SERIES OF EMERGENCY LANE CHANGES TO PULL OFF THE FREEWAY INTO THE EMERGENCY LANE.  RESTARTING THE VEHICLE ERASED THE WARNING LIGHTS.    THIS IS THE 2ND OCCURENCE OF THIS PROBLEM IN 7 DAYS.  VEHICLE IS 2001 BMW M COUPE WITH S54 ENGINE.
